Package model

Class Shop

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Shop
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Shop
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class representing a shop having name, address, productlist, itemlist and orderlist
    See Also:
